Blog.post: im going to winnipeg tmo! well thats pretty much all i gotta say today...but i watched Freddy VS Jason so im goona give a review of that tmo or the next day!

Last night i went to c catwoman at the theater. id go c it again...definatly!!!! Halle Berry is SOOO F***ing hot in the black leather suit ;-)...!...i give it 4 out of 5 stars (****/*****) and wrestling was on last night too who is the new GM? Theodore Long, the new Crusier Weight Champ? Spike Dudly, and the new US Champ? Booker T. Im happy that spkie won the crusier weight title but i still think Rey should still have it and about the new GM? meh hes alright and booker t SUCKS @S$!!!! Well im out bye!

hey everyone i debuted the new version of my site today and so far everyone likes it! but yeah newayz i may be doin sumthin this weekend like camping or going to winnipeg fr a day but probably not. The nominations 4 the VMA's were announced today britney has 4 noms while jayz, beyonce, usher and sum other ppl have 5 i hope britney wins all of them plus shes made it to the next round of the viewers choice face-offs and shes not scheduled to perform yet but i hope she does maybe she'll make a suprise appearance like last year and debut her new song!!! but w/e im gonna go bye!

grr...i thought the nominations for the vma's were supposed to be out today :@ but so far they arent!!! and the summer music mania thing wasnt that in June? ppl r saying that the performers from that are at the teen choice awards!!! Well on a more positive note my website may do the '2004 Britney News Awards' it isnt official but if it is the awards are ready and some of the nominees are already on the list! But sometime this weekend i will announce if its officail or not! Well visit my site and bye...

Hey everyone. well i havnt been updating cuz ive been working on a huge suprise for for my site. The new version debuts on August.1 and its awsome! I went to edmonton for a few days and went to the west edmonton mall and a wedding...it was outsdie and it was already +35 degrees (C) outside at 11 in the morning. well i think thats it for now bye!

Hey, im watching britney spears live from miami, its a 'outragous' then 'boom boom' then 'me against the music'...i have the whole concert line up memorized :)!!! Well the new version of my site debuts on July.31 themed 'oops...i did it again' with a new host (geocities)! well anywayz ttyl byez!!!
